vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Pelon or Palet(?), first mentioned at 2Sa.23.26; also called Paltite at 2Sa.23.26;
Also named: pal.ti (פַּלְטִי "Paltite" H6407)
§ Pelonite = "a certain one"
the inhabitants of a presently unknown place
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比倫人 这个形容詞, 種族名稱在原文的意思是 "特定的一位"
現今所在不詳的某地居民 (代上 11:27,36, 27:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
比伦人 这个形容词, 种族名称在原文的意思是 "特定的一位"
现今所在不详的某地居民 (代上 11:27,36, 27:10)
